Pm or email correspondence at [url]Stottlemire800@gmail.com[/url] PayPal payment. Shipped priority. Possible trades considered PSA/SGC crease free centered T206 Young, or Lajoie with bat or Port, 56 Topps Mantle, 50 Bowman Robinson or Rookie Nolan Ryan.
